alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison and east central Washington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Wesley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Crosses... Patrick... Sulphur City... Combs... Delaney... Durham... Arnett... Hicks... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas.
